attributes.action: Stop Ticket Master making a profit on ticket sales
attributes.additional_details: Stop ticket master from profiting on ticket sales by buying all the tickets then selling them on a sister site for at least 4 times the face value of the ticket. The profit they make purely goes to the company and the artists do not see this money. This is happening as soon as the tickets go on sale so fans have not got a chance of buying tickets at face value.
